data.name: RPG Maker MV - Useful Decorative Plant Tiles
data.detailed_description:
This software includes stylish houseplant tilesets.
It can be easy to use this in combination with the tilesets that come with RPG Maker MV.

This software includes not only vases and potted plants, but also wall decorations and large decorations.
This is a great introduction to learn how to make your maps, as you can easily create a gorgeous map.

---------------------------------
◆Material files
・Recommended tiles for tileset C x1

◆Sample Project
Contains 5 maps that utilize tilesets in this software.
---------------------------------

◆Caution◆
Please note that this product is only the decorative plant part. The buildings and other objects are shown in the screenshot are tilesets from "RPG Maker MV".
